CustomField.formula:
AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Approver_2__c)), Enable_10_Rule__c = False,
OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Package_Secure_Type__c, "Secured"), Total_Relationship_Exposure__c > X1st_Approver__r.LLC_BI__Secured_Individual_Lending_Authority__c), AND( ISPICKVAL(Package_Secure_Type__c, "Unsecured"), Total_Relationship_Exposure__c > X1st_Approver__r.LLC_BI__Unsecured_Individual_Lending_Authority__c), AND( ISPICKVAL(Package_Secure_Type__c, "Cash Secured"), Total_Relationship_Exposure__c > 250000),
ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Risk_Rating__c, "3"), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Risk_Rating__c, "4"), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Risk_Rating__c, "5"), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Risk_Rating__c, "6"), ISPICKVAL(LLC_BI__Risk_Rating__c, "7"), Any_Classified_Loan_100M__c = True, Classified_Loan_Long_Term__c = True))
CustomField.label: Delete - Testing Approval Steps
